text: The Tomb of Xerxes I is a Catacombs located in Marvdasht.This Tomb is part of the Naqsh-e Rostam And This is Xerxes I's Tomb. == Gallery == File:Naghsh-e Rostam - Rostam inscription - panoramio.jpg File:Fars, جاده قدیمی حاجی آباد * زنگی آباد، Iran - panoramio - Farid Atar (3).jpg File:Rostam inscription - Naghsh Rostam - panoramio (3).jpg File:Naghsherostam.jpg File:Xerxes detail Maka soldier.jpg File:Xerxes detail Hidush enhanced.jpg File:Xerxes I tomb Ionian soldier circa 470 BCE.jpg File:Xerxes I tomb Sogdian soldier circa 470 BCE.jpg File:XERXES I.jpg ==Sources== Category:Naqsh-e Rustam Category:Tourist attractions in Fars Province Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:Buildings and structures in Fars Province Category:Achaemenid architecture
title: Tomb of Xerxes I
